brief_description: The scheme provides free pre-examination training to eligible candidates for various competitive exams to enhance their preparation and improve their chances of success.
detailed_description: The &quot;Prak Pariksha Prashikshan Kendra&quot; is an initiative launched by the Backward Classes and Extremely Backward Classes Welfare Department, Bihar, aimed at supporting underprivileged candidates aspiring to appear for competitive exams. It offers free coaching for exams like Civil Services, SSC, and others. The program includes expert guidance, study materials, and mentoring, enabling candidates to prepare effectively and achieve their career goals. <br> <br>
benefits: Free Coaching: Free coaching in Prak Pariksha Prashikshan Kendras   . Incentive: Students will be provided an incentive amount of ₹3,000/- (three thousand rupees) based on 75% attendance. Note:  There is no hostel provision in the centers.
eligibility_criteria: The student must be a permanent resident of Bihar state. The student must belong to the Backward Class or Extremely Backward Class. The maximum annual income of the student or their guardian, from all sources, should not exceed ₹3,00,000/-. The student's age and minimum educational qualifications must meet the eligibility criteria for the competitive exam related to the respective course.

steps: Step-2: In the application form, fill in all the mandatory fields, paste the passport-sized photograph (signed across, if required), and attach copies of all the mandatory documents (self-attest, if required).

Step-3: The application must be submitted to the concerned Director, Pre-Exam Training Center, via registered mail or speed post. Applicants may also personally submit the application form at the office of the concerned Pre-Exam Training Center (Refer page no 3 of the Guidelines to see the training center list).

documents_required: Proof of identity (e.g., Aadhaar card). Proof of residence. Educational qualification certificates. Caste or community certificate (if applicable). Recent passport-sized photographs.
